fields.name: Make Salad (Charge 50%):
fields.value: Attack a player whose response used fewer letters of the alphabet (A-Z) than yours. You will also rampage, attacking with half power any visitor whose response used fewer letters of the alphabetic (A-Z) than yours.

fields.name: Malnourish (Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked when you place in the top 3. Use during the day phase. Target X (1-5) players. They will each receive a random list of (6-X) letters their response cannot contain. You will automatically attack any violator of this restriction before the night starts.
